Lyric:
[by:mark阿远]
[ti:Another Red Light]
[ar:David Hodges]
[al:The Rising]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00]David Hodges-Another Red Light
[00:12.00]Another red light on a cold november day
[00:16.00]I see the faces following close in a long headlight parade
[00:22.00]To a resting place where tear-stained eyes say goodbye
[00:30.00]I've been moving so fast i've forgotten where i'm going
[00:34.00]I'm driving blind but the wheels of life have a beautiful Way of slowing you down sometimes
[00:42.00]To catch your breath and take a second to
[00:48.00]Smile when you're not supposed to laugh
[00:55.00]And cry when you're supposed to hold it back
[01:01.00]And live like the sun is burning out of the sky
[01:08.00]'Cause tomorrow's too late so don't waste a day of this life
[01:20.00]The long black car moves slow through the intersection
[01:25.00]I take a left and i point my life in the opposite direction
[01:31.00]I take a breath 'cause i can't help thinking
[01:36.00]of the man in that lincoln is telling me to
[01:42.00]Smile when you're not supposed to laugh
[01:49.00]And cry when you're supposed to hold it back
[01:55.00]And live like the sun is burning out of the sky
[02:02.00]'Cause tomorrow's too late so don't waste a day of this life
[02:10.00]So many souls are set on leaving for eden
[02:22.00]But i will cherish this time here
[02:32.00]Yeah yeah
[02:39.00]Smile when you're not supposed to laugh
[02:45.00]And cry when you're supposed to hold it back
[02:51.00]And live like the sun is burning out of the sky
[02:59.48]'Cause tomorrow's too late there's no time to wait
[03:05.00]So don't waste a day of this life
